channel.title: CVE Feed for Liferay -- DXP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Liferay -- DXP

item.title: CVE-2023-3426|2024-10-02T15:24:59.097Z -- liferay -- dxp
item.description: The organization selector in Liferay Portal 7.4.3.81 through 7.4.3.85, and Liferay DXP 7.4 update 81 through 85 does not check user permission, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain a list of all organizations.

item.title: CVE-2024-25143|2024-10-02T15:29:27.818Z -- liferay -- dxp
item.description: The Document and Media widget In Liferay Portal 7.2.0 through 7.3.6, and older unsupported versions, and Liferay DXP 7.3 before service pack 3, 7.2 before fix pack 13, and older unsupported versions, does not limit resource consumption when generating a preview image, which allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via crafted PNG images.
